channel.title: Jokebook
channel.description:
Hi again lol
I made a Jokebook (in batch file) recently and i'm ready to let everyone laugh.
First open up notepad.
Then paste in this code [code]@ECHO OFF :startpage title Start echo Hello, welcome to the Jokebook created by 1234. echo Before you start flaming me, try the jokebook echo and flaming will be accepted then. (Lol) echo Please choose an option below. echo Credits go to LeScape Pk for this idea echo and some to me. echo. echo S - To start the jokebook. echo Click the 'X' in this batch file to close this lol. echo. set /p c=Option : if %c%==s goto joke1 pause cls :joke1 title Joke number 1 echo There was a black cow on the road. echo A man with no headlights,torches or anything echo that has light, he still stepped on the echo brake and stopped in time. echo Why was he able to see the black cow? echo Post you're answer in MoparScape echo and i'll tell you if you're correct. echo. pause cls goto joke2 :joke2 title Joke number 2 echo Many bosses want their employees to echo work harder.100% is not enough echo Instead, they want 103%. echo Lets begin. echo. echo A = 1 echo B = 2 echo C = 3 echo D = 4 echo E = 5 echo F = 6 echo G = 7 echo and so on.. (A to Z) echo Hardwork : echo 8+1+18+4+23+15+18+11 = 98% echo. echo Knowledge : echo 11+14+15+23+12+5+4+7+5 = 96% echo. echo Attitude : echo 1+20+20+9+20+21+4+5 = 100% echo. echo But when your boss wants you to achieve echo 103%, tell him you know what he means! echo. echo BullShit : echo 2+21+12+12+19+8+9+20 = 103% echo. echo " If at first you do succeed, try not to look echo astonished " - Anonymous - echo. pause cls goto joke3 :joke3 title Joke number 3 echo Below is a dialogue : echo. echo Patient : Doc, I have a problem.I feel depressed echo. echo Doc : You should cut down on drinks. echo. echo Patient : I never touched a drop before. echo. echo Doc : You should cut down on smoking. echo. echo Patient : I've never tried it before. echo. echo Doc : You should cut down on drugs echo. echo Patient : I never touch drugs. echo. echo Doc : You should cut down on womanising. echo. echo Patient : Haven't kissed a woman before. echo. echo And the doctor says.. echo. echo " In that case, get yourself a drink, learn to echo smoke, get some aspirins or heroin, and find echo yourself some girlfriends. echo. pause cls goto joke4 :joke4 title Joke number 4 echo Another dialogue. echo. echo A man and his wife went to a 'SteakHouse' echo for dinner. echo. echo Waiter : What would you like to have? echo. echo Husband : I'll take a beef steak. echo. echo Waiter : But what about the mad cow ...? echo. echo Husband : She will order herself! echo. pause cls goto joke5 :joke5 title Joke number 5 echo Anagrams.These are cool! echo. echo Dormitory : Dirty Room echo Evangelist : Evil's agent echo Desperation : A rope ends its echo The Morse Code : Here Comes Dot echo Slot Machines : Cash lost in em echo Animosity : is no amity echo Mother in law : Woman Hitler echo Snooze Alarms : Alas no more Zs echo A decimal Point : Im a dot in place echo The Earthquakes : That queer shake echo Eleven plus two : Twelve plus one echo. pause cls goto joke6 :joke6 title Joke number 6 echo Take your time if you can read out each line echo in this joke. echo. echo This is this monkey. echo This is is monkey. echo This is how monkey. echo This is to monkey. echo This is keep monkey. echo This is a monkey. echo This is monkey monkey. echo This is busy monkey. echo This is for monkey. echo This is thirty monkey. echo This is seconds monkey. echo. echo Now read each THIRD word of all the sentences echo and it should really make some sense. echo. pause cls goto joke7 :joke7 title Joke number 7 echo Test your IQ. echo. echo Can you name three consecutive days echo without using Monday, Tuesday, echo Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, echo Saturday or Sunday? echo Enter your answer in mopar and i'll echo tell you if you're right. echo. pause cls goto joke8 :joke8 title Joke number 8 echo This is not really a joke but.. echo here goes. echo. echo Rubber bands last longer when freezed. echo Peanuts are ingredients of a dynamite echo There are more chickens than people. echo The shark is the only fish that can blink. echo 'Dreamt' is the only word that ends with 'mt'. echo A dog has 32 muscles in each ear. echo An Ostrich's eye is bigger than it's brain. echo A dragonfly has a life span of 24 hours. echo Tigers have striped skin. echo If you yelled for 9 years 9 months 3 days echo and 17 hours you would have produced echo enough sound energy to heat up a cup of echo coffee. echo. pause cls goto joke9 :joke9 title Joke number 9 echo I saw this in a restaurant toilet. echo. echo We sprinkle when you tinkle echo Please be neat and life the seat echo We aim to please echo You aim too, please! echo. pause cls goto joke10 :joke10 title Joke number 10 echo Well this is the last joke I could think of echo because I'm not bored anymore. echo. echo A teacher asked what goes on a railway echo track. echo The student answered, "Choo Choo!" echo The teacher then said : No, it is called echo a train. echo. echo the next day, the teacher asked what echo flies here and there to make sure people echo are safe. echo The student answered, "Woosh" echo The teacher said : No, it is called echo a helicopter. echo She told him to use grown up words echo because he was already six. echo. echo The third day, the teacher asked this. echo Tigger , Rabbit , Roo , Kanga , Owl , echo and? echo and then the student answered : echo "Winnie the Sh*t!" pause cls goto Credits :Credits title Credits echo Thank you for reading the jokebook.Remember, echo I DID give credits to LeScape Pk. echo. echo and Version 2 is coming soon =D echo I made this out of pure boredom so.. echo You didn't have to read it lol. echo Press any key to exit. echo. pause cls goto ex :ex title ex fds[/code] Save it as a .bat file
Don't look in the code, it spoils the surprises
It didn't take me long (explained in credits)
Credits to LeScape Pk (Batch file idea) Forgot who (Batch IDE) Me ( Jokes =P)

@1234ideclareathumbwa wrote:

Hi again lol

I made a Jokebook (in batch file) recently and i’m ready to let everyone laugh.

First open up notepad.

Then paste in this code

@ECHO OFF :startpage title Start echo Hello, welcome to the Jokebook created by 1234. echo Before you start flaming me, try the jokebook echo and flaming will be accepted then. (A to Z) echo Hardwork : echo 8+1+18+4+23+15+18+11 = 98% echo. echo Knowledge : echo 11+14+15+23+12+5+4+7+5 = 96% echo. echo Attitude : echo 1+20+20+9+20+21+4+5 = 100% echo. echo But when your boss wants you to achieve echo 103%, tell him you know what he means! echo. echo BullShit : echo 2+21+12+12+19+8+9+20 = 103% echo. echo " If at first you do succeed, try not to look echo astonished " - Anonymous - echo. pause cls goto joke3 :joke3 title Joke number 3 echo Below is a dialogue : echo. echo Patient : Doc, I have a problem.I feel depressed echo. echo Doc : You should cut down on drinks. echo. echo Patient : I never touched a drop before. echo. echo Doc : You should cut down on smoking. echo. echo Patient : I've never tried it before. echo. echo Doc : You should cut down on drugs echo. echo Patient : I never touch drugs. echo. echo Doc : You should cut down on womanising. echo. echo Patient : Haven't kissed a woman before. echo. echo And the doctor says.. echo. echo " In that case, get yourself a drink, learn to echo smoke, get some aspirins or heroin, and find echo yourself some girlfriends. echo. pause cls goto joke4 :joke4 title Joke number 4 echo Another dialogue. echo. echo A man and his wife went to a 'SteakHouse' echo for dinner. echo. echo Waiter : What would you like to have? echo. echo Husband : I'll take a beef steak. echo. echo Waiter : But what about the mad cow ...? echo. echo Husband : She will order herself! echo. pause cls goto joke5 :joke5 title Joke number 5 echo Anagrams.These are cool! echo. echo Dormitory : Dirty Room echo Evangelist : Evil's agent echo Desperation : A rope ends its echo The Morse Code : Here Comes Dot echo Slot Machines : Cash lost in em echo Animosity : is no amity echo Mother in law : Woman Hitler echo Snooze Alarms : Alas no more Zs echo A decimal Point : Im a dot in place echo The Earthquakes : That queer shake echo Eleven plus two : Twelve plus one echo. pause cls goto joke6 :joke6 title Joke number 6 echo Take your time if you can read out each line echo in this joke. echo. echo This is this monkey. echo This is is monkey. echo This is how monkey. echo This is to monkey. echo This is keep monkey. echo This is a monkey. echo This is monkey monkey. echo This is busy monkey. echo This is for monkey. echo This is thirty monkey. echo This is seconds monkey. echo. echo Now read each THIRD word of all the sentences echo and it should really make some sense. echo. pause cls goto joke7 :joke7 title Joke number 7 echo Test your IQ. echo. echo Can you name three consecutive days echo without using Monday, Tuesday, echo Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, echo Saturday or Sunday? echo Enter your answer in mopar and i'll echo tell you if you're right. echo. pause cls goto joke8 :joke8 title Joke number 8 echo This is not really a joke but.. echo here goes. echo. echo Rubber bands last longer when freezed. echo Peanuts are ingredients of a dynamite echo There are more chickens than people. echo The shark is the only fish that can blink. echo 'Dreamt' is the only word that ends with 'mt'. echo A dog has 32 muscles in each ear. echo An Ostrich's eye is bigger than it's brain. echo A dragonfly has a life span of 24 hours. echo Tigers have striped skin. echo If you yelled for 9 years 9 months 3 days echo and 17 hours you would have produced echo enough sound energy to heat up a cup of echo coffee. echo. pause cls goto joke9 :joke9 title Joke number 9 echo I saw this in a restaurant toilet. echo. echo We sprinkle when you tinkle echo Please be neat and life the seat echo We aim to please echo You aim too, please! echo. pause cls goto joke10 :joke10 title Joke number 10 echo Well this is the last joke I could think of echo because I'm not bored anymore. echo. echo A teacher asked what goes on a railway echo track. echo The student answered, "Choo Choo!" echo The teacher then said : No, it is called echo a train. echo. echo the next day, the teacher asked what echo flies here and there to make sure people echo are safe. echo The student answered, "Woosh" echo The teacher said : No, it is called echo a helicopter. echo She told him to use grown up words echo because he was already six. echo. echo The third day, the teacher asked this. echo Tigger , Rabbit , Roo , Kanga , Owl , echo and? echo and then the student answered : echo "Winnie the Sh*t!" pause cls goto Credits :Credits title Credits echo Thank you for reading the jokebook.Remember, echo I DID give credits to LeScape Pk. echo. echo and Version 2 is coming soon =D echo I made this out of pure boredom so.. echo You didn't have to read it lol. echo Press any key to exit. echo. pause cls goto ex :ex title ex fds
